txt.en: Protect the steeds at the stables from the invading Orcs and Dunlendings. If necessary, the steeds can be manually released to prevent them from being attacked, but should only be done as a last resort.
A jaw-trap has been set outside the stables
Defend the horses from enemy waves ([placeholder]/7)
An enemy jaw-trap has been disabled

A small group of enemies has made their way to the stable behind Helm's Dike. They are trying to drive away the steeds and placing traps to prevent riders from retreating back to the Hornburg. Horses can be commanded to run free, but will be unavailable to assist any retreating Rohirrim.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>partial</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Moderate Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Horses' enemy attacks survived

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss</rgb>
* Rohirrim defender defeated
* Horse attacked to the point of fleeing

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Loss</rgb>
* Jaw-trap set by Orcs

<rgb=#00FF00>Major Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Jaw-trap disarmed
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the steeds to leave the stable ([placeholder]/8)</rgb>
